sources.title: Painted Horses | Full Movie | Heartwarming Drama | Madelyn Deutch
sources.description:
Painted Horses - A young teacher with a storied past must win over an impossible collection of kids and become a balm in a troubled town in need of healing.
2017.  Stars: Grace Caroline Currey, Linc Hand, Deana Carter

metadata.Plot: Ms. Hoog is destine to be a loser like the many generations in her family that preceded her, but the legacy will end with her, because by strength of character and sheer determination she is going to forge a new path and a new destiny for her and her son.
metadata.Actors: Grace Caroline Currey, Madelyn Deutch, Linc Hand
